value.title: Add or Edit Columns When Importing Data from Analysis Services into Power BI
value.excerpt: If you use SQL Server Analysis Services as a data source for Power BI, you have two types of connection; Live Connection or Import Data. value.title: Add Prefix and Suffix to a Text in Power BI   Generate Country Images and pages

value.title: Age Banding in Power BI using Power Query   Merge Queries Based on Between
value.excerpt: Age banding is a common scenario in analytics, and I have explained how it is possible in many different ways.
